entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The family that the narrator is referring to. They are mentioned as getting into bed and falling asleep.

entities.name: mrs dursley
entities.description: Mrs Dursley fell asleep quickly. She is a member of the Dursley family.

entities.name: mr dursley
entities.description: Mr Dursley lay awake, turning it all over in his mind. He is a member of the Dursley family.

entities.name: potters
entities.description: The Potters are mentioned as being involved and knowing what Mr and Mrs Dursley do.

relationships.description: Mr Dursley is concerned about the Potters being involved. He thinks there's no reason for them to come near him and Mrs Dursley.
Mrs Dursley is also concerned about the Potters being involved. She is a member of the Dursley family and shares Mr Dursley's concerns.
Mr Dursley is related to Mrs Dursley. They are a married couple and members of the same family.
The Potters know Mr Dursley and his wife, Mrs Dursley.
The Potters also know Mrs Dursley. She is a member of the Dursley family and shares Mr Dursley's concerns.
